mapper.insert: INSERT INTO os_customer ( customer_telephone, nickname, password, customer_email, create_time, state ) VALUES ( #{customer.customer_telephone}, #{customer.nickname}, #{customer.password}, #{customer.customer_email}, #{customer.create_time}, #{customer.state} )
